text: man Gita and lorina once upon a time in
the lake town of Luzon there lived a
fisherman with his two daughters man
Gita and lorina man Geeta was the eldest
daughter and was very kind and loving to
everyone the younger one Larina however
was just unlike her sister in every way
she would be mean to other people catch
butterflies and impose them in bottles
for fun and often speak rudely with her
sister man Geeta did all the chores of
the house and ensured food was cooked so
that when their father returned home
from his day's work
hungry and exhausted he had his food
ready to eat and his bed made for him to
sleep Larina never helped her sister and
cared less about her father she would
spend her time sitting near the lake
combing her hair and looking at her
reflection am I the most beautiful girl
in the town or what
Who am I kidding there is no one more
beautiful than me in the hall of the
kingdom let alone this small poor town
one day the fisherman fell very ill and
passed away man Geeta was devastated she
cried and wept for hours but soon
realized that the responsibility of her
family now rested on her shoulders she
gained her composure and went to tell
the Rina about her decision
Loreena as usual sat by the lake
obsessing over her looks sister I am
here to talk to you about something
important oh go away can't you see I am
busy well I won't take much of your time
Oh what is it well since father is not
with us anymore we don't have anyone
earning for us hence I have decided to
go sell fish in the market every day I
don't know if it would be enough but I
would try my best okay whatever and
leave me alone you don't have to be so
unkind with me I love you you know right
oh I don't need your love sister I was
born in the wrong family
but know this things won't always stay
the same I am destined to become a queen
one day and leave this miserable
miserable town and all of you behind my
prince charming will come you will see
man Gita let out a sigh
oh I wish nothing but happiness for you
little system days passed and mangey too
worked very hard to make ends meet for
herself and her sister one day when she
came home with just a few coins she felt
very concerned
Loreena I am sorry but what I earn is
not enough to feed the two of us would
you help me in selling the fish from
tomorrow what what did you just say I'm
asking you to help me sell the fish so
that we can make enough money for the
two of us please sister you must be out
of your mind I am a future queen you
want me to become a peasant no way but
sister that's enough I am going to the
lake man Geeta was very sad she sat down
and started to Larina stepped out of the
house and saw an old lady standing
outside what do you want old woman oh
and have walked for miles would you be
kind enough to give me a loaf to eat
little water to drink do I look like a
servant to you out of my face Loreena
pushed the old woman out of her way and
walked away hearing an old woman's cry
man Geeta at once came out of the house
she was horrified to see the woman lying
down oh I am so sorry man Geeta helped
the old woman stand up and brought her
inside the house the old woman explained
her how lorina had pushed her man Geeta
was shocked oh I am sorry Oh grandmother
my sister can sometimes be a little
unkind oh that's all right he seemed to
be the kinder one if you would be kind
enough to give me a little love to eat
and water to drink I would be on my way
man Gaeta nodded and brought her the
only bread she had she also gave her a
glass of water
the old woman happily ate the bread and
drank the water thank you so much my
child you are a kind soul saying this
the old woman left man-eater went to
sleep empty stomach a few days later man
Geeta fell ill and was bedridden Larina
as usual did not care much
[Music]
please go to the market and tell the
fish we have no savings to survive I am
not going anywhere I'm telling you for
the last time saying that Larina
stepped out of the house to find the old
woman again again what do you want now I
think Ito is unwell I have brought her
these feeds that will help her recover
let me in so that I can give her a feed
every hour and take care of her you will
see that fine morning he will be fine
Larina grinned her teeth she did not
want manga eat her to recover she
pretended to smile oh you don't have to
give yourself trouble she is my sister
give the seeds to me and I will make
sure that she is taken care of
are you sure oh absolutely
okay Larina
took the bag of seeds from the old woman
man Gita's fever worsened and all night
she could not sleep she kept tossing and
turning in her bed her eyes started to
turn yellow
Loreena felt immense joy seeing her
sister's suffer she did not even once
tell her about the seeds and hid the bag
under the bed the next morning when she
woke up she found manga
waiting profusely she smiled and as she
was about to leave the house the old
woman entered huh you don't dare you
enter our house without permission
the old woman smiled and snapped her
fingers at once she turned into a
handsome looking man what you you are an
angel I am no angel I am a prince
Prince Stephen of house Valley Dom I
have mystic powers and have been out and
about looking for the kindest woman on
earth to marry and I must say I have
finally found the right girl if she were
happy of course my friend you have no
idea how long I have waited to for this
day let's go far away from this place
and live happily ever after
quiet you wicked soul I wasn't talking
about you huh
and Stephen turned his sight towards man
Gaeta and closed his eyes
golden light surrounded his body man
Gaeta who lay on the bed with her eyes
closed
illuminated of the golden light to
Larina
watched all of this in astonishment
soon magneto opened her eyes and stood
up feeling perfectly alright
Prince Steven opened his eyes and the
golden light vanished man Geeta was
dumbfounded as she had no clue what was
going on
Prince Stevens smiled and then explained
everything to her I was out all night
watching over you your sister not only
did not give you the seeds she also
prayed for your worst man Geeta was
devastated to Hue everything she turned
towards her sister sister why why do you
hate me so much oh please I don't have
time for all this drama go away from
here with your prince and let me be I
have never liked you and I never ever
will
tears rolled out of mangas eyes but the
prince came forward to console her do
not feel sad over her she does not
deserve your love and kindness let's go
away from here and into my kingdom I
would like to make you my wife if you
will have me as your husband but
but she is my sister well some people
never change it's best if you realize it
now our YouTube done this is getting
tiring now manga eater looked at Prince
Steven and nodded Prince Steven snapped
his fingers and the two vanished into
thin air in a grand wedding
manga and Prince even tied the knot and
the two lived a happy and content life
Larina stayed the same unkind and cruel
towards others she did not change a bit
man Keita however made sure that her
sister received enough food without her
knowledge
Prince Steven often laughed at mangas
hope for her sister to change well some
people never change my sister will
change one day I know it oh I'm not
talking about her I'm talking about you
and your faith in her
[Music]
